# Ionic Vue.js Mobile Application - Setup Progress

## Project Overview
Mobile application for road work tracking in Antananarivo, Madagascar using Ionic Framework and Vue.js.

## Setup Checklist

- [ ] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [ ] Scaffold Ionic Vue.js project
- [ ] Install dependencies
- [ ] Create static data files
- [ ] Implement authentication
- [ ] Create core views
- [ ] Implement map components
- [ ] Configure router
- [ ] Test application

## Current Status
Setting up project structure...
